  • Method Details

    • createBookPostList

      public static HashMap<String,PostTerm> createBookPostList(int bookID, String bookUri, String splitRegex)
      Reads the book passed by parameter (bookID and bookUri) and build the post list of the terms for that book
      Parameters:
      bookID - the identifier number of the book
      bookUri - the relative path of the book where it's stored
      splitRegex - the regular expression to filter the books
      Returns:
      a HashMap where: Key: is the term Value: is an object of the class PostTerm that will be persisted

    • saveFile

      public static boolean saveFile(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, String FILE_DIRECTORY) throws IOException
      Saves the file passed by parameter on the path of FILE_DIRECTORY
      Parameters:
      file - that will be saved
      FILE_DIRECTORY - the path where save the file
      Returns:
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getFile

      public static org.springframework.core.io.Resource getFile(Path path) throws MalformedURLException
      Parameters:
      path - of the file to download
      Returns:
      the resource contained in the URL
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - if the URL is not formed properly
